mapper.select: SELECT A.idm, A.regdt, A.lastmsg, A.lastdt, B.iuser as fromiuser FROM t_dm A INNER JOIN t_dm_user B ON A.idm = B.idm AND B.iuser = ${fromiuser} ORDER BY A.idm DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dm_user ( idm, iuser ) VALUES ( ${idm}, ${iuser} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.idm, A.seq, A.iuser, A.msg, A.regdt , B.nm as writer FROM t_dm_msg A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.idm = ${idm} ORDER BY A.seq DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${limit}
